AkoubaCredit - Chicago, IL - Software Engineer - ONSITE

We're a part of Techstars Chicago. I'm a founder & CTO. We're looking to bring on our first engineer.

Rails (web app) & Python (data analytics) shop Looking for backend experience (doesn't have to be Rails) plus one of the following:

JS frameworks

System admin

DB admin

Data analytics

We're a SaaS company that provides banks a platform to streamline the processing of small business loans. Banks can now offer the simplicity and speed of the online lenders (OnDeck, Lending Club) but with much, much better terms for the entrepreneur.
